it.unibas.trikc.coverage

Class JacocoServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unibas.trikc.coverage.JacocoServices

  • public class JacocoServices
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class used as a bridge to the JaCoCo library
    Author:
    TeamCoverage
    See Also:
    Coverage, Analyzer, CoverageBuilder, ExecutionDataStore, SessionInfoStore, Instrumenter, IRuntime, LoggerRuntime, RuntimeData
